import { Card,Button,Flex,Image,Input,Form} from 'antd'; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; export default function ProfilePage({person,setPerson}){ return(
setPerson({...person, name: e.target.value})}/> setPerson({...person, contact: e.target.value})}/> setPerson({...person, introduction: e.target.value})}/>
) }
